# 7.0 Docs

> Documentation for 7.0 Docs.

*Topics available: 3*

- [Breaking change: AllowRenegotiation default is false](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/networking/7.0/allowrenegotiation-default.md): Learn about the .NET 7 breaking change in networking where the default value of SslServerAuthenticationOptions.AllowRenegotiation has been changed to false.
- [Breaking change: Custom ping payloads on Linux](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/networking/7.0/ping-custom-payload-linux.md): Learn about the .NET 7 breaking change in networking where an exception is thrown on non-privileged Linux processes when a custom payload is passed to the Ping method.
- [Breaking change: Socket.End methods don't throw ObjectDisposedException](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/networking/7.0/socket-end-closed-sockets.md): Learn about the .NET 7 breaking change in networking where Socket.End methods no longer throw ObjectDisposedException when the socket is closed.
